text: Heh, yeah, the song "Opala" from Two Worlds starts like a normal old song, then SUDDENLY -- Disco Fever! and this occurs in a regular old, medieval market castle town, so it made a startling impression on me, lol.  I'm just a sucker for these kind of songs with catchy beats. =)

author: eolian

text: And hey, maybe they'll give handhelds a shot! That would be interesting... No one beats Nintendo at handhelds, but Microsoft could give them one hell of a competition!
author: NeatNit

text:
Please let the new Xbox have a feature similar to share button. I know it's a silly thing to care about, but in-game capture for consoles is so annoyingly hard, I just want it to become standard. Specifically for handhelds where there is NO way to record footage or screenshots.

I'm actually a Nintendo gamer in consoles, but things I would like to see in a new Xbox is... well, more of the same. Solid hardware to allow solid games. And not too much social integration, but that's inevitable sadly.
author: NeatNit

text: Looking at the few press reviews, it doesn't seem like this was particularly good game, but I did come across this menu theme and instantly loved it. Tomorrow is Xbox day, a 2 hours conference starting at 1pm EST. I'm very curious to see how Microsoft responds to Sony. We'll probably see most of the software during their E3 conference though.
author: SupraDarky
